Description: I purchased this guitar on January 2017 as a surprise present for a friend of mine who wanted to get into guitar. Incidentally they went out and bought the same exact guitar after I recommended this one around the same time so I just kept this one for myself. I already have a large collection of other guitars that I play 99% of the time. Occasionally I may pick this one up but I have an actual Gibson Les Paul to pick up as well so this one doesn't get played that often. It's mostly been in a hard case under my bed for the last year. That said, I think this is a great guitar for the money. It won't break the bank but it offers the sound quality of much more expensive guitars. It looks, feels, and sounds like a true Les Paul. It's a great guitar for someone who is progressing in skill or transitioning into electric guitar from acoustic. It's also a great option for someone looking for a relatively cheap electric guitar that can take a beating from regular practice, gigs, travel, etc. but still sounds amazing. The quality of the guitar is pristine. It has barely been played since I purchased it. There have been no falls or water exposure. The only small defects are three very small scratches on the sides of the guitar body, which I've taken a picture of attached. This was caused by my living room table next to my sofa. I sometimes bump my guitars on it when I put them down. They're barely noticeable. The actual face, back, and neck of the guitar remain as new. The guitar has been stored in a hard case under my bed when not in use. I'm the only one who has played it and I've used it only at home. The guitar will come with a black gig bag to protect it during shipping and for storing or carrying it around with you. This is how it sounds like on a 15W Fender Blues Jr. amp with some slight overdrive and clean tones: https://vimeo.com/309678957. It's worth noting that Les Pauls offer a good range of control over your tone by just working with the dials on the guitar as I do in the video.
Title: Used Epiphone Les Paul 100 Electric Guitar Heritage Cherry Sunburst and Gig Bag
